channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Security review for Microsoft Edge version 119
item.description:
We are pleased to announce the security review for Microsoft Edge, version 119!
We have reviewed the new settings in Microsoft Edge version 119 and determined that there are no additional security settings that require enforcement. The Microsoft Edge version 117 security baseline continues to be our recommended configuration which can be downloaded from the Microsoft Security Compliance Toolkit.
Microsoft Edge version 119 introduced 8 new computer settings and 3 new user settings. We have included a spreadsheet listing the new settings in the release to make it easier for you to find them....
